name: True-joystick-
tagline: A simple joystick done with deep research
body:
### True Joystick
A Virtual Joystick for Unity3d, with Auto Hiding Joystick . Dynamic Joystick position .
It is inspired by a Gamesutra article [here](http://www.gamasutra.com/view/feature/6323/a_guide_to_ios_twin_stick_shooter_.php?print=1) and a Youtube Video [Watch here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-sEJ4Lo0cm8).

Note: The project uses CrossPlatformInput from Unity Standard Assets. Don't forget to import that its free in Asset store [Download](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/32351)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
